Airlangga Rapat Bareng Erick Thohir Bahas TPPI
05 Nov 2019, 03:23 by Vadhia Lidyana


Kemenko Bidang Perekonomian/Foto: Puti Aini Yasmin

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto pagi ini menggelar rapat koordinasi mengenai optimalisasi pengembangan Trans Pacific Petrochemical Indotama (TPPI) di kantornya, di kawasan Lapangan Banteng, Jakarta Pusat.Airlangga tiba di kantornya sekitar pukul 10.00 WIB. Ia mengatakan, rakor kali ini juga akan melihat lagi bagaimana rencana pemerintah menjadikan TPPI sebagai BUMN. Menurutnya, secara teknis TPPI sudah menjadi bagian dalam BUMN karena saham terbesarnya dipegang oleh PT Pertamina (Persero)."Ini kita lihat dulu strukturnya, jadi kita bahas. Kan sudah menjadi bagian dari BUMN karena saham terbesarnya milik Pertamina. Nanti opsinya seperti apa kita lihat," kata Airlangga di kantornya, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).Dalam rakor ini, turut hadir Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir hadir didampingi Wamen BUMN, Budi Gunadi Sadikin. Erick hadir di kantor Airlangga pukul 9.30 WIB. Lalu, Menteri Perindustrian Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita juga hadir di kantor Airlangga sekitar pukul 9.40 WIB.Kemudian, pada pukul 9.45 WIB hadir juga di kantor Airlangga, yakni Direktur Utama Pertamina Nicke Widyawati. Dalam rakor ini, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati juga dijadwalkan hadir.Sebagai informasi, sebelumnya, Menteri Koordinator Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Panjaitan telah mengusulkan agar TPPI dijadikan sebagai badan usaha milik negara (BUMN)."TPPI juga tadi sudah kita usulin supaya jadi BUMN sendiri. Sudah tadi sudah diperintahkan, kita akan buat. Dan paling penting orang yang menghambat proses pembangunannya itu akan diganti," kata Luhut dalam rapat terbatas (ratas) di Istana Presiden, Jakarta, Rabu (30/10/2019). Airlangga Meeting with Erick Thohir Discuss TPPI
05 Nov 2019, 03:23 by Vadhia Lidyana


Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs / Photo: Puti Aini Yasmin

Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto this morning held a coordination meeting on optimizing the development of the Trans Pacific Petrochemical Indotama (TPPI) in his office, in the Banteng Field area, Central Jakarta .irlangga arrived at his office at around 10:00 WIB. He said the coordination meeting will also look again at how the government plans to make the TPPI a BUMN. According to him, technically TPPI has become a part of BUMN because its largest share is held by PT Pertamina (Persero). "We will see the structure first, so we will discuss it. It has already become a part of BUMN because Pertamina owns the largest shares. Later, what options will we see? , "Airlangga said in his office, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). In this coordination meeting, Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (SOE) Erick Thohir was present accompanied by BUMN Deputy Minister Budi Gunadi Sadikin. Erick was present at the Airlangga office at 9.30 WIB. Then, Minister of Industry Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita was also present at the Airlangga office at around 9.40 WIB. Then, at 9.45 WIB also at the Airlangga office, namely Pertamina's President Director Nicke Widyawati. In this coordination meeting, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati was also scheduled to attend. "It has been ordered, we will make it.
